mapper.select: select * from (select word_no,wname,meaning,substitute,user_id,dic_recommend_user,dic_recommend,report_count_user,report_count,rownum r from (select * from dictionary_table order by word_no desc)) where r >=#{start} and r<=#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary_table values(dictionary_table_seq.nextval, #{wname}, #{meaning}, #{substitute}, #{user_id}, null, 0, null, 0 )
mapper.select: select dic_recommend_user from dictionary_table where word_no=#{word_no}
mapper.update: update dictionary_table set dic_recommend_user = NVL2(dic_recommend_user,(dic_recommend_user||','||#{user_id}),#{user_id}), dic_recommend=dic_recommend+1 where word_no=#{word_no}
update dictionary_table set wname=#{wname}, meaning=#{meaning}, substitute=#{substitute} where word_no=#{word_no}
mapper.insert: update dictionary_table set report_count_user = NVL2(report_count_user,(report_count_user||','||#{user_id}),#{user_id}), report_count=report_count+1 where word_no=#{word_no}
mapper.select: select * from report_table order by report_no desc
